markdownRemark.html:
So Iâ€™ve not done much of this blogging thing before.

Scratch that. Iâ€™ve done plenty of this before but have never really kept purpose and inevitably just wiped whatever blog I had rolling. Always good to start fresh, yes?

Without a clear goal every blogging venture I have ever embarked on eventually became yet another meandering examination of the self that no one in any clear state of mind would have any interest in at all. Iâ€™ll try and keep that to a minimum. ðŸ¤ž

So whatâ€™s going to make this any different? Optimism! Idealism! Naivety! Itâ€™s kind of part of my job now!

As I fall into place here at VCU Alt Lab Iâ€™ll be using this space to talk about what it is exactly I do here. Expect exhaustive posts on Wordpress development, clunky write-ups on programming techniques I have no business pretending to be an authority on, and meandering self examination with a slant towards the creative process. Also cartoons.

Hope youâ€™ll find something of at least questionable value. Continue at your own risk.
